title: InfinteSkills C++ Memory Management Training
description:
InfinteSkills C++ Memory Management Training
=============================================
Duration: 1 hours - 11 tutorial videos | Date Released: 2013-10-17 | Instructor: Brook Monroe 

A Practical C++ Training Course That Teaches Real World Skills
---------------------------------------------------------------

In this project-based C++ Memory Management video tutorial series, you'll quickly have relevant skills for real-world applications.

Follow along with our expert instructor in this training course to get:

 Concise, informative and broadcast-quality C++ Memory Management training videos delivered to your desktop
 The ability to learn at your own pace with our intuitive, easy-to-use interface
 A quick grasp of even the most complex C++ Memory Management subjects because they're broken into simple, easy to follow tutorial videos

Practical working files further enhance the learning process and provide a degree of retention that is unmatched by any other form of C++ Memory Management tutorial, online or offline... so you'll know the exact steps for your own projects.

01. Overview
    0101 Introduction

02. How It Goes Wrong
    0201 Leaks And Overruns

03. Playing In Your Own Sandbox - Avoiding Overruns
    0301 STL Vector Methods, Range Checking, And Sentinels

04. Taking Care Of Your Environment - Cleaning Up After Yourself
    0401 Memory Leaks - Part 1
    0402 Memory Leaks - Part 2

05. Once It Is Gone, It Is Gone - Reusing Released Memory And Other Bad Ideas
    0501 Pointers, Pitfalls, And Best Practices

06. This Is Not A Trust Relationship
    0601 Initialize Everything; Trust But Verify

07. Simultaneous Data Access - A Primer
    0701 Reading And Writing Shared Assets

08. Stupid Code Tricks
    0801 Undefined Behaviour And Other Bad Practices

09. Old School Rules - Best Practices
    0901 The Heap And STL Wrappers

10. Conclusion
    1001 About The Author
